title: IT & Telecom Market to Grow At an Encouraging CAGR of 37% in Cloud Storage till 2018
text:
The report titled Cloud Storage Market - IT & Telecom Outlook (2014-18) showcases an in-depth analysis of the market in terms of market size and the respective market forces (drivers, constraints, opportunities and challenges). This report also forecasts the growth numbers till 2018 (on a YoY basis) and hence suggests the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) for the estimated period.
Unlimited Capacity is Proving Very Beneficial for IT & Telecom Market
IT & Telecom industry is one of the bellwether industries to adopt emerging technologies more aggressively. With a possibility of having unlimited capacity across different sections within the industry along with addressing the concern of security, the need for cloud storage in getting vocal with every passing day.
Data digitization is also gaining prominence thereby cloud storage also being implemented accordingly. With major companies like Amazon investing heavily in the technology, the market is looking optimistic. Mobility is also playing a vital role in defining a lot of aspects for this market. Handheld devices and their operations generate volumes of data with a need to integrate them across all devices.
Market Segments and Forecasts Covered in the Report
The Global Cloud Storage market is segmented by:
· Regions (North America, Europe, APJ, South America, ROW)
· Deployment (Private, Public, Hybrid)
· End-Users (Enterprise, Mid-Size, Small Business)
· Industry (Financial Services, Healthcare, IT & Telecommunication, Manufacturing, Retail, Others)
· Solution (Primary, Backup, Cloud Storage Gateway, Data Movement and Access)
Companies discussed in the Global Cloud Storage research report include Amazon Web Service, Aorta Cloud, Box Inc., Cleversafe, Ctera Networks, Dropbox, EMC Corporation, Fujitsu Ltd., Google, Hewlett – Packard, Hitachi Data Systems, IBM, Internap, Microsoft, Netapp, Rackspace Inc., Riverbed Technology, Scality, Wagapi
